channel.title: [Pi] Armor level sets [Pi]
channel.description:
Idk what is going on, you can wear basic armor like steel, black, mith, adam, and rune at any level. I added this to make it so you have to have a defence level of 40 to wear rune
[code] case 8850: case 1079: case 1093: case 1113: case 1127: case 1147: case 1163: case 1185: case 1201: case 2615: case 2617: case 2619: case 2621: case 2623: case 2625: case 2627: case 2629: c.defenceLevelReq = 40; break;[/code]
But it still didn't work, earlier I tried this,
[code] if (itemName.contains("rune")) { if(!itemName.contains("platebody") && !itemName.contains("shield") && !itemName.contains("platelegs") && !itemName.contains("kite") && !itemName.contains("helm")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 40; } return; }[/code]
But that didn't work either, any ideas?

item.title: [Pi] Armor level sets [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Ohh I thought it was extending the rune, learnin every day. Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Armor level sets [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

if (itemName.contains("rune")) { if(!itemName.contains("platebody") && !itemName.contains("shield") && !itemName.contains("platelegs") && !itemName.contains("kite") && !itemName.contains("helm")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 40; } return; }
Think about this part. Understand that ‘!’ means not, so the first line is saying if the item name does not contain plate body, make the defense requirement 40. This statement is just making the item, if existent, “rune,” have a level 40 defense requirement.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Armor level sets [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Idk what is going on, you can wear basic armor like steel, black, mith, adam, and rune at any level. I added this to make it so you have to have a defence level of 40 to wear rune

case 8850: case 1079: case 1093: case 1113: case 1127: case 1147: case 1163: case 1185: case 1201: case 2615: case 2617: case 2619: case 2621: case 2623: case 2625: case 2627: case 2629: c.defenceLevelReq = 40; break;

But it still didn’t work, earlier I tried this,

if (itemName.contains("rune")) { if(!itemName.contains("platebody") && !itemName.contains("shield") && !itemName.contains("platelegs") && !itemName.contains("kite") && !itemName.contains("helm")) { c.defenceLevelReq = 40; } return; }

But that didn’t work either, any ideas?
